nodes.text: Darsana was a male Anselmi who served as the Senator of the world of Glee Anselm within the Galactic Senate during the Clone Wars. He was in support of the Loyalist Committee during this time.

Darsana was voiced on set by Rob Coleman. However, his scene was cut from the final release of Attack of the Clones, and though the scene appears as one of the Deleted Scenes on the DVD, Darsana does not appear.
